title: Ukraine cyber-attack: Russia to blame for hack, says Kyiv
description: About 70 Ukrainian government websites were targeted, including the foreign and energy ministries.

title: YouTube rich list: MrBeast was the highest-paid star of 2021
description: Between them, the 10 highest-paid YouTubers raked in $300m last year.

title: REvil ransomware gang arrested in Russia
description: Russian authorities dismantle the notorious cyber-crime gang at the request of the United States.

title: Pebbles get caught in Mars rover and other tech news
description: LJ Rich looks at the best of the week's technology news stories.

title: Tech Tent: Has Theranos changed Silicon Valley?
description: Elizabeth Holmes defrauded investors, but could the scandal usher in a change to Silicon Valley?

title: Meta faces billion-pound class-action case
description: Facebook's 44 million UK users could share £2.3bn in damages, a competition expert intending to sue Meta says

title: North Korea hackers stole $400m of cryptocurrency in 2021, report says
description: Blockchain research firm Chainalysis says the value extracted from the hacks grew by 40% year-on-year.

title: Google will spend £730m to 'reinvigorate' its UK offices
description: The tech giant is expanding UK staff capacity by 50% and wants to "reinvigorate" the work environment.
